heading: Today
text: Periods of sunshine and cloud cover. Chance of a few spotty snow showers. Chilly. Highs from the mid-teens in the north, increasing to near 20 as you head south. West wind 10 to 15 mph, occasional gusts up to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Any snow showers diminishing. Lows in the single digits, dropping below zero in some of the cooler hollows. Wind turning southwest becoming light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Snow showers arrive in the afternoon, then spreading east. Occasional periods of low visibility. Highs from the mid 20s in the northeast, increasing into the upper 20s, and nearing 30 in the southern valleys. Wind gusts increasing 20 to 25 mph west of the Greens.
